publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-793 Rhona Brankin: The Role of Sport in Social Inclusion—That the Parliament endorses the Scottish Executive’s vision of achieving equality of opportunity for all; supports its aim of making Scotland a more inclusive society where inequalities between communities are reduced; recognises the important role which sports can play in promoting social inclusion; and commends the work of the Executive, sportscotland and other agencies to widen participation in sport as part of personal and community development. Supported by: Mr Sam Galbraith*
